summary: This mod adds a strong, unique and lore friendly weapon to the game that can only be found in the Stillborn Cave. UPDATE: It can be crafted into a two-handed sword and the other way around.
descriptionHtml:
The sword is one handed (can be held in any hand) and its a unique weapon which can only be found in [u]Stillborn Cave[/u] north-east on the world map. Its placed [u]on a throne inside the cave[/u]. Getting there might proove a bit difficult but its worth it since the sword is strong. If you cannot find the sword on the throne [u]loot the Falmer around the throne[/u], sometimes one of them picks it up.

[b][url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=68612429]Steam Workshop Version[/url][/b]

UPDATE 1.1:
> added the two-handed version
> added recipes to \"convert\" the sword into two- and one-handed
> stats balancing

Note: The sheath of the two-handed version always stays on the back of the character. Due the bad positioning of the default back position the sheath also has some clipping errors sometimes, I cannot solve those.

Basic values:

[u]One-handed[/u]

Raw damage: 15
Value: 4500
Weight: 14

[u]Two-handed[/u]

Raw damage: 25
Value: 4500
Weight: 14

You can craft the one-handed Sword into a two-handed sword at the forge, provided that you have the Ebody Smithing-Skill and you need the Loner\'s Sword one-handed as an ingredient. You can craft it the other way around, too.
The swords are stronger than Daedric weapons, but cost a lot more to improve. Both recipes [u]can be found in the Steel category of the forge menu[/u].
If you want both swords at the same time simply add them over the console, they have the following FormID:

One-handed: XX01000D62
Two-handed: XX01001002
Where \"XX\" is the mod start number.
If you don\'t know how to find out the mod start number type the following into the console:
[i]help loner\'s 4[/i]
then add the item to you inventory by writing
[i]player.additem <Mod ID> 1[/i]

Graphic features include a baked normals map which makes the shading look really good. Textures are high-resolution to add to you gaming experience. It also includes a custom sheath and realistic shaders.
[b]If there are any bugs, post in the comments and it will be taken care of as soon as possible.[/b]
